testcase.name: testBcryptDecryptShouldSupportLegacyKeyDerivationProcess
testcase.system-err: [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Plaintext: This is a plaintext message. The value can be obtained in the calling code by invoking 'cipher.getIV()'; [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Cipher text (91): 243261243132244b34562e30564f4c65477034665153474e6379794a2e4e69466953414c544211f54a69fdf4e59eda22424398b8ef4e6946694956256ca391838ef7a2d4f1817722924e321673c5daafba72c88914e2a30a663a17 [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Creating Bcrypt hash with salt [33a5c0d9740d808afa8525083ded342c] (16 bytes) [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Generated Bcrypt hash in 280 ms [main] WARN org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptor - Error decrypting content using Bcrypt-derived key; attempting legacy key derivation for backward compatibility [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Creating Bcrypt hash with salt [33a5c0d9740d808afa8525083ded342c] (16 bytes) [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Generated Bcrypt hash in 281 ms [main] WARN org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.KeyDerivationBcryptSecureHasher - Using Legacy Key Derivation on bcrypt hash including cost and salt [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Plaintext (29): This is a plaintext message.

testcase.name: testScryptSaltShouldBe16Bytes
